clinical_history: Follow-up PET-CT after chemotherapy to assess treatment response.
findings: Mild inflammatory uptake in left lung lower lobe region.
No evidence of new metastatic lesions compared to prior scan.
Multiple hypermetabolic lesions in bones, suggestive of metastases.
Diffuse uptake in thyroid gland, differential includes thyroiditis or nodular disease.
Focal uptake in left lung lower lobe consistent with post-surgical changes.
recommendations: Refer to oncology or specialist for further management.
